name: HardWired (devilock)
description:
HardWired is a tower defense game.

However, unlikely other similar games, in HardWired the player will not have to build and place turrets or buildings: everything is already placed and can only be activated  (or deactivated).

  • Connect buildings to the Power Generator to activate them
  • Manage Power supply
  • Produce Resources
  • Unlock and research Upgrades
  • Defeat enemy waves and keep track of time 
  • 5 Levels
  • 3 Enemy types

Design, Programming, Art, Music:

Mattia Pastorino (Linkedin)


This is my final graduation work for Game Design course @ Event Horizon School

It has been achieved in roughly one month of work
